Preferences for Real-Time Data

You can configure data editing parameters as follows:

l Allow users to edit data from devices. This option does not affect manual data entry for non-device variables.

l Allow users to edit real-time data after it has been validated. (The validation feature is typically used in critical care environments but not perioperative ones. See also Configuration Options for All Flowsheets.)

l Change the color that identifies edited values on flowsheets. The default color is red. If users might confuse a red value with alert status, for example, you can use another color.

l Set the default status for alerts. Alerts identify values that are outside of configured alert limits for a variable.
